column2: As an Imperial Priestess I am expected to remain a virgin until such a time that I am replaced. Unfortunately, it seems word has gotten out that I might not be as much of a virgin as I am supposed to be, which reflects poorly on me and on the Chrysanthemum Throne.

As an Imperial Priestess, [From.GetBestName] is supposed to remain a virgin until she is replaced. However, rumor has it that this is not the case, which reflects poorly on both her and on the Chrysanthemum Throne, and the expectation is that I will address the situation appropriately.
